articles.description: In a freewheeling chat, Joshua Little, the first player from Ireland to play in the IPL, talks about his run with Gujarat Titans so far, time spent with coach Ashish Nehra in the nets and lavishes praise on captain Hardik Pandya.
articles.content: On December 23 in 2022, Ireland seamer Joshua Little was following the IPL mini-auction on a YouTube stream. The 23-year-old had enrolled his name and was hoping to attract a bid after a solid show f… [+8081 chars]
